{"name": "Ministry at Holy Trinity Episcopal Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "AN APPOINTMENT IS REQUIRED FOR THE FOOD PANTRY
WE SERVE AREA CODES: 30002, 30030, 30032, 30033, 30079, 30307, and 30317
FOR FOOD PANTRY APPOINTMENTS AND PRESCRIPTIONS, PLEASE CALL: 404-373-9283
FOR UTILITY ASSISTANCE, PLEASE CALL: 404-373-2300
ALL UTILITY HELP IS DONE OVER THE PHONE ONLY — NO WALK UPS.  You must be in danger of being shut off. You must have a previous amount due from last month's bill and a current bill. WE SUGGEST YOU CALL EARLY FOR UTILITY ASSISTANCE. We have a limited amount of money available to distribute each day.
WE START ANSWERING THE PHONES AT 8:30 AM
", "email": "", "url": "deamdecatur.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "515 East Ponce de Leon Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Sycamore Ridge", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30030", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.7753959, "longitude": -84.2889878}, "phones": [{"number": "(404) 373-9283", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
